hadith.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:"Muadh stood up and prayed Isha', and made it lengthy. The Prophet (ï·º) said: 'Do you want to cause hardship to the people, O Mu'adh; do you want to cause hardship to the people O Mu'adh? Why didn't you recite 'Glorify the Name of your Lord Most High' or Ad-Duha or; 'When the heaven is cleft asunder?
